title: [WIP] Thrift Router
description: Web-app that gives users the perfect route to hit all the thrift stores in their area. Made for the web and optimized for mobile. Built with React and Leaflet.

title: Racketscript Playground
description: Playground for RacketScript, a Racket-based programming language that compiles to JavaScript. Both server-side and client-side code is written in RacketScript. I ported the site from Bootstrap 3 to Bootstrap 5 and all of the jQuery calls with pure JavaScript equivalents. I worked on this as part of my position as an undergrad researcher/software dev intern at UMass Boston.

title: Interactive Exoplanet Predictor
description: Interactive Exoplanet Predictor uses machine learning to predict the number of exoplanets that a star would have based on several variables, including radius, surface gravity, age, temperature, etc. A 3D model of the predicted star system is generated based on each new set of inputs.

title: HTML5 Platformer
description: 2D platformer game written in pure JavaScript using the HTML5 canvas API. I wrote the physics engine, controls, and particle rendering 100% from scratch.
